pr_title: DPC 641 match org or provider to any fields

timeline.message: change log variables, fix a code climate complaint
match the org or provider npi to any npi fields in the eob
change list to string joine by semi colon for dpc json parsing to be successful

timeline.bodyText: Do we want to null check the providerOrRosterID before getting UUID?
timeline.author: MrMorie

replies.bodyText: I assume it's not possible for the job to have a null providerID
replies.author: MrBilnon

timeline.author: em1

replies.bodyText: Actually, maybe this is one case where it should be provider (i.e., extractProviderNpis(), since it's getting all the NPIs from the EoB.
replies.author: em1

timeline.bodyText: Similar blocks of code found in 5 locations. Consider refactoring.
timeline.author: codeclimate
